answerText: rainfall[10] This is an area of land for which all of the surrounding rainfall drains into the same body of water.
heading: STIMPY |2015 | Editors 2 | 14 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: In 2001, algae caused a terrifying red form of this phenomenon, the amount of which is measured by a hyetograph. For 10 points each: [10] Name this liquid precipitation which provides the source for the study of hydrology.
